!Priestess Athenia: Hmm.... you've done better than I thought you would. But I'm not sure if I trust you yet. Do one more thing for me, and my confidence in you will never be in question again. Return to the Fields of Silence and defeat the *Suppressors* and *Exterminators* that you encounter there. Bring me back *20 Enchanted Golem Fragments* and your place amongst us will be secured.
